title: Pictures of You
lyrics:
Like a comedian star
I waited for the bus to pull away
And through the fumes
A picture view
And your funny face
And pictures of you

Standing in-between a laundry mat

And the gallery window

With the piece of art that looked like trash



Pictures of you

Pictures of you

Pictures of you

When we were young

When we were young



Lovin' the future is just a fantasy

Lovin' the past is just a memory

A picture of you standing somewhere in-between

Standing between the trees

And the cleaners

And the broken mirrors

And the trashcan feeders



Pictures of you

Pictures of you

Pictures of you

When we were young

When we were young



Pictures of you
